name: shared-config-monorepo
description: A single dependency and single command to configure and run various code linters and tools.

scripts.bin-ignore: git ls-files | grep cli.js | xargs -I {} git update-index --skip-worktree {}
scripts.bin-restore: pnpm run bin-unignore && git ls-files | grep cli.js | xargs -I {} git restore --source HEAD -- {} && pnpm run bin-ignore
scripts.bin-unignore: git ls-files | grep cli.js | xargs -I {} git update-index --no-skip-worktree {}
scripts.build: pnpm run build:stand-alone && pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:copy-readme
scripts.clean: git rm -f pnpm-lock.yaml ; pnpm run bin-restore ; git clean -fdXq
scripts.release: pnpm run build && bumpp -r --commit 'Release: %s' && pnpm run build && pnpm -r publish --otp $(op read 'op://Personal/Npmjs/one-time password?attribute=otp')
